Animation&Effects

Tasty CSS-animated Hamburgers

Hamburgers is a collection of tasty CSS-animated hamburger icons. Also included is the source as a Sass library. Itâ€™s modular and customizable, so cook up your own hamburger.

https://jonsuh.com/hamburgers/

https://github.com/jonsuh/hamburgers

Hover.css

A collection of CSS3 powered hover effects to be applied to links, buttons, logos, SVG, featured images and so on. Easily apply to your own elements, modify or just use for inspiration. Available in CSS, Sass, and LESS.

http://ianlunn.github.io/Hover/

https://github.com/IanLunn/Hover

CSSgram

CSS library for Instagram filters.

http://una.im/CSSgram/

https://github.com/una/CSSgram

magic

CSS3 Animations with special effects.

http://minimamente.com/example/magic_animations/

https://github.com/miniMAC/magic

Preloaders

Single Element CSS Spinners

This is a collection of loading spinners animated with CSS. Each spinner consists of a single article with a class of loader and content text of"Loading...". The text is for screen readers and can be used as a fallback state for older browsers.

http://projects.lukehaas.me/css-loaders/

https://github.com/lukehaas/css-loaders

Loaders

http://codepen.io/matthewpalmer/pen/nFmtg

Loaders.css

Delightful and performance-focused pure css loading animations.

http://connoratherton.com/loaders

https://github.com/ConnorAtherton/loaders.css
